from collections import *
def go():
 n,s,t=int(input()),input(),input()
 if Counter(s)!=Counter(t): return -1
 ans=0
 for i in range(n):
  k=0
  for j in range(i,n):
   while k<n and s[k] != t[j]: k += 1
   if k == n: break
   k += 1
   ans = max(ans, j-i+1)
 return n-ans
for _ in range(int(input())):
 print(go())

 n,s,t=int(input()),input(),input()
 if Counter(s)!=Counter(t): return -1
 ans=0
 for i in range(n):
  k=0

   while k<n and s[k] != t[j]: k += 1
   if k == n: break
   k += 1
   ans = max(ans, j-i+1)
 return n-ans
for _ in range(int(input())):
 print(go())
